## What is webR?

- [webR](https://docs.r-wasm.org/webr/latest/) is 

- You can run R code in a web browser

  - no installation
  
  - no server required
  
## Try it!

[teaching-with-webr.netlify.app](https://teaching-with-webr.netlify.app/)

```{webr-r}
# set a random seed and generate data
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(100)

# calculate mean
mean(x)
```
